alert.note: Alert for Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 8:25AM CDT until June 13 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Central Morris County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Titus County in northeastern Texas... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rocky Branch, or 11 miles east of Mount Pleasant, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daingerfield, Linden, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Naples, Omaha, Cason, Jenkins, Rocky Branch, Fairview, Avinger, Marietta, Red Hill and Pruett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
